name: Bear Hunt 8: The Final Hunt (Previously Campfire Simulator)
name_original: Bear Hunt 8: The Final Hunt (Previously Campfire Simulator)
description:
Bear Hunt 8: The Final Hunt

While out camping alone you find yourself face to face with bears! Venture into the woods to gather firewood to build your fire up in order to scare the bears off.  Or die trying. 

Game Created By Team 5!
